## utils package

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [copy(input, { target })](./utils.copy.md) | 复制字符串到剪贴板 必须响应用户手势事件调用，例如“click”或“keyup”。 |
|  [parseMilliseconds(milliseconds)](./utils.parsemilliseconds.md) | 将毫秒转换成对象 |
|  [prettyBytes(number, options)](./utils.prettybytes.md) | Convert bytes to a human readable string: <code>1337</code> → <code>1.34 kB</code>. |
|  [prettyMilliseconds(milliseconds, keepMilliseconds)](./utils.prettymilliseconds.md) | 将毫秒格式化成 n天n小时n分钟n秒\[n毫秒\] |
|  [second2str(seconds)](./utils.second2str.md) | 秒转换成 n天n小时n分钟n秒 |
|  [slice2star(string, begin, end)](./utils.slice2star.md) | 提取字符串的一部分替换成 \* 号，且不会改动原字符串 |
|  [toThousand(n, digits)](./utils.tothousand.md) | format a number to thousand points |

|  Namespace | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Copy](./utils.copy.md) | Specify a DOM element where the temporary, behind-the-scenes <code>textarea</code> should be appended, in cases where you need to stay within a focus trap, like in a modal. |
